# (4) Go è¯­è¨€çš„åç¨‹ goroutine

# (5) è¢«åºŸå¼ƒçš„ goroutine è°ƒåº¦å™¨

    "os"
    "fmt"
    "runtime/trace"
)

func main() {

    //åˆ›å»ºtraceæ–‡ä»¶
    f, err := os.Create("trace.out")
    if err != nil {
        panic(err)
    }

    defer f.Close()

    //å¯åŠ¨trace goroutine
    err = trace.Start(f)
    if err != nil {
        panic(err)
    }
    defer trace.Stop()

    //main
    fmt.Println("Hello World")
}

package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "time"
)

func main() {
    for i := 0; i < 5; i++ {
        time.Sleep(time.Second)
        fmt.Println("Hello World")
    }
}
